Enables the cinematic camera while zooming.
config.okzoomer.option.cinematic_multipl: The multiplier used on the multiplied cinematic camera.
config.okzoomer.option.reduce_sensitivit: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
config.okzoomer.option.hide_hands.toolti: While enabled, zooming hides your hands.
config.okzoomer.option.smooth_transition: Enables smooth transitions when zooming in and out.
config.okzoomer.option.zoom_toggle.toolt: Enables the ability to toggle zooming.
config.okzoomer.option.zoom_divisor.tool: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
config.okzoomer.option.zoom_scrolling.to: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
config.okzoomer.option.minimum_zoom_divi: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
config.okzoomer.option.maximum_zoom_divi: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
config.okzoomer.title: Ok Zoomer Config
